head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ALPERT, MORRIS, M.D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ALPERT, MORRIS, M.D.

block.p: ALPERT-Morris, M.D. On May 7, 2000. Beloved uncle of Carol and Ellen Alpert. Also survived by brother Robert, sister-in-law, Sylvia, nephew, Steven and two great nieces, Sarah and Hannah. Memorial service on Monday, May 15, at 11AM, Temple Beth Emeth, Albany, New York. In lieu of flowers, contributions to Morris Alpert Scholarship Fund, Albany Medical College, New Scotland Avenue, Albany, NY 12210 or Community Hospice, 315 South Manning Blvd, Albany, New York 12208.
